au.gov.naa.digipres.xena.kernel
Class ByteArrayInputSource

java.lang.Object
  org.xml.sax.InputSource
      au.gov.naa.digipres.xena.kernel.XenaInputSource
          au.gov.naa.digipres.xena.kernel.ByteArrayInputSource

public class ByteArrayInputSource
extends XenaInputSource

An input source that comes from in-memory rather than an external file.

ByteArrayInputSource

public ByteArrayInputSource(byte[] bytes,
                            int offset,
                            int length,
                            Type type,
                            java.lang.String mimeType,
                            java.lang.String encoding)
Parameters:
bytes - raw data to use as input
offset - offset within bytes
length - length of data
type - the type of data expressed as a Xena FileType
mimeType - the mime-type of the data
encoding - the character encoding of the data

ByteArrayInputSource

public ByteArrayInputSource(java.io.InputStream inputStream,
                            Type type)
                     throws java.io.IOException
Construct a source from a given input stream. First we read the stream and cache the result (in case we need to open it multiple times) and then we can stream it back again.

Parameters:
inputStream - inputStream source of data
type - the type of data expressed as a Xena FileType
Throws:
java.io.IOException
